thread.title: U.S. housing starts increase, single-family segment weak

title: U.S. housing starts increase, single-family segment weak
text:
U.S. housing starts increase, single-family segment weak 6:06pm BST - 01:13 
U.S. homebuilding increased more than expected in March amid a rebound in the construction of multi-family housing units, but weakness in the single-family segment suggested the housing market was slowing. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. homebuilding increased more than expected in March amid a rebound in the construction of multi-family housing units, but weakness in the single-family segment suggested the housing market was slowing.
